Cloudbacon A flowy thought place

Professionalism At Its

18 Mar 2011

…worst best. Well nursing a food comma from lunch this afternoon, I stumbled onto this post about “professionalism” from the editor / owner of The Next Web. The epidemic issue underlying the idea of professionalism is the fact that people hide behind it. They might initially think it is the correct way to act in a business situation; however, as they evolve it becomes a shield and eventually a crutch. I implore everyone to read the article, it is quick, easy and written oh so much better than what I could produce. Afterward, think long and hard why you may weight the idea of “professionalism” so highly.
